definitions.definition: Son of Iapetus and Clymene , brother to Atlas , Menoetius and Prometheus , of whom he ignored warnings to beware of any gifts from Zeus . He accepted Pandora as his wife, thereby bringing sorrow to the world; father to Pyrrha .
A moon of the planet Saturn .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) Son of Iapetus and Clymene , brother to Atlas , Menoetius and Prometheus , of whom he ignored warnings to beware of any gifts from Zeus . He accepted Pandora as his wife, thereby bringing sorrow to the world; father to Pyrrha .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) A moon of the planet Saturn .
